references.paper_title: SALUN: Empowering machine unlearning via gradient-based weight saliency in both image classification and generation
references.reason: This paper is important because it is frequently cited and provides a baseline for comparison and because it empowers machine unlearning.

references.paper_title: Model sparsity can simplify machine unlearning
references.reason: This is a highly-cited reference demonstrating a connection between sparsity and machine unlearning, offering a method to simplify the unlearning process.
This paper provides a foundation for unlearning, and is frequently cited for its approach to achieving unbounded unlearning in machine learning models.

references.paper_title: Deep learning face attributes in the wild
references.reason: This is an important reference as it establishes the benchmark dataset of CelebA used throughout the paper's experiments, and it contributes to the field of deep learning face attributes.

references.paper_title: Distributionally robust neural networks for group shifts: On the importance of regularization for worst-case generalization
references.reason: This work is frequently cited and provides a baseline for group-robust optimization, introducing an approach to handle distribution shifts and improve worst-case generalization.
